pinyin: fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 bei4 xin1
fu2 li4 tiao2 zheng3 zhuang1 zhi4

sentences.english: In ground experiments, buoyancy influence impedes the understanding on combustion phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 在地面实验中观测到的燃烧现象，包含了浮力的影响。

sentences.english: Tiny floats along each stem are enough to hold it up.
sentences.chinese: 每节海藻茎周围的微小浮力就足以使它傲然挺立。

sentences.english: The raft was buoyed up by empty petrol cans .
sentences.chinese: 这木筏依靠空汽油桶的浮力漂浮。

sentences.english: The raft was buoyed up by empty petrol cans.
sentences.chinese: 依靠空汽油桶的浮力漂浮。

sentences.english: A water pump for filling water into or draining water from the buoyancy compartment is arranged in the floating dock box.
sentences.chinese: 浮坞箱中有用于向浮力舱内充水或排水的水泵。

sentences.english: Wear a life jacket or buoyancy vest.
sentences.chinese: 穿救生服或者浮力背心。

sentences.english: The relationship between mixing time and buoyant stirring energy density is also obtained.
sentences.chinese: 并得到熔池混匀时间与浮力搅拌功率密度的关系。

sentences.english: By trapping air, hair could make diving suits more buoyant, Nasto says.
sentences.chinese: 毛发可以通过困住空气，使潜水服获得更多浮力。

sentences.english: The West-Guangdong coast current is driven by buoyancy and monsoons.
sentences.chinese: 粤西西向沿岸流受浮力与季风驱动。

sentences.english: Item and serial numbers are printed on the warning label located in the non-inflation area of the buoyancy compensator.
sentences.chinese: 条款和序列号印在浮力补给装置的标签上。

sentences.english: The thermocapillary and buoyancy driven flow are included in the solution of momentum equations.
sentences.chinese: 动量方程求解中考虑了热表面张力与浮力联合驱动流。

sentences.english: Modern blimps use helium instead of hydrogen to maintain buoyancy.
sentences.chinese: 现代软式小飞艇，利用氦取代氢来保持浮力。

sentences.english: Buoyancy forces drive the bubble (shown in yellow and red) rapidly to the surface of the white dwarf.
sentences.chinese: 浮力将驱使泡沫状火焰快速至表面。

sentences.english: The freedom of buoyancy allows us to act as we truly are.
sentences.chinese: 浮力给予我们自由，让我们随心而动。
